conversation.content:
[confused] Wait, what do you mean the union's—hold on, I'm, er, I'm reading this email again. [pause] They're dissolving the entire boom operators union? [shocked] And the pension fund is just... gone? [nervous laugh] This has to be, like, some kind of mistake, right? I mean, thirty-two years I've been paying into that fund. Thirty-two years of, you know, every single paycheck, and now they're saying—[angry] oh my God, embezzled? [shouting] Are you fucking kidding me? 

[shaky voice] I was supposed to retire in three years. My wife and I, we had—we literally just put a deposit on that place in Vermont. [bitter] And these bastards, what, they just took it? All of it? [furious] Every production I worked, every sixteen-hour day holding that boom over my head until my shoulders were screaming, and for what? So, um, so leadership could just—[trailing off]

[very sad] I don't even know what to tell Linda. She's gonna—[sigh] God, we're sixty-one years old. What am I supposed to do, start over? [exhausted] Like, honestly, how does this even happen? The thing is, we trusted them. [regretful] We trusted them with our whole future, and they just... [long pause] they just stole it.

subject: Finding out your boom operator union is being dissolved and your pension fund was embezzled by leadership
